EmailTemplate.name: 01_20_2015 Hybrid Cloud WP.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Whitepaper: Timing Workload Bursts to AWS and Windows Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intelligent Bursting to Amazon Web Services® & Windows Azure® Get Free Whitepaper <http://vmturbo.com/hybrid-cloud-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000hybrid&utm+content=011915> <http://vmturbo.com/hybrid-cloud-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000hybrid&utm+content=011915> {{Lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, The hybrid cloud has been heralded as a promising IT operational model enabling enterprises to maintain security and control over the infrastructure on which their applications run. At the same time, it promises to maximize ROI from their local data center and leverage public cloud infrastructure for an occasional demand spike. However, these benefits don’t come without challenges. Download this whitepaper <http://vmturbo.com/hybrid-cloud-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000hybrid&utm+content=011915> for a brief history of hybrid cloud, its benefits and challenges, and how VMTurbo customers determine which workloads are the best bursting candidates when.
Get Free Whitepaper <http://vmturbo.com/hybrid-cloud-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000hybrid&utm+content=011915> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
